originalText.text: I had a hip replacement with Dr Doug Unis. He is a very nice and compassionate person. He went out of his way to help me at times and has always been helpful with my questions. Highly recommended

text.text: I had a hip replacement with Dr Doug Unis. He is a very nice and compassionate person. He went out of his way to help me at times and has always been helpful with my questions. Highly recommended

originalText.text: Dr Doug Unis may be a competent surgeon performing anterior hip replacement. but when there are complications such as an infected prosthesis, he is unwilling to treat the problem. When I told him my operated hip was hurting, he told me it was bursitis. I had to go to another surgeon to perform a ‘revision’ meaning four operations and a year of pain. I carry a large permanent scar in my thigh where he performed the surgery and still have pain from scar tissue. I highly recommend against going to him because problems do occur in surgeries and you must trust your surgeon to be there after the actual operation.

originalText.text:
Dr. Unis is my angel.. God know how happy I'm.. I was in so much pain for ten yrs.. I was walking around with my hip out of place and I was told all I had was arthritis .. I changed my primary doctor and found Dr. Africa I will love to thank my primary doc but this is about Dr Unis... Dr Unis look at my leg I couldn't move it I couldn't even swim or do anything as small as mop... Dr Unis told me I needed a hip replacement I look at him like if he was CRAZY. . I guess he was right so on that note I would love to give doc Unis so much respect and admiration for the best hip doc. ..
THANK YOU SO MUCH DR UNIS IM SO HAPPY AND NO PAIN...

originalText.text: Dr. Unis is the bomb! He performed a Anterior total hip replacement and I'm recovering Brilliantly! He has a great staff and guided me through this with comfort and professionalism.

text.text: Dr. Unis is the bomb! He performed a Anterior total hip replacement and I'm recovering Brilliantly! He has a great staff and guided me through this with comfort and professionalism.

originalText.text: One of the worst experience. If you do not need a surgery where he see he can make money on your case you are wasting your time seeing him. This doctor is cold, does not care and give you no time.
